name: 10.16 "One Hugs, the Other Doesn't" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was Carla talking to on the phone in the cold opening?
questions.explanation:
Her mother.

	Norm thought it was her kids but she said, "I don't talk to my kids that way." Rebecca, after hearing how Carla talked to her own mother, asked her call Rebecca's mother.

questions.text: What was the name of the Nanny G show?
questions.explanation:
1992 Tickle Tummy Tour.

	Sam got tickets for Frederick's birthday. Lilith was happy but Frasier was not.

questions.text: How old did Frederick turn on his birthday?
questions.explanation:
2.

	The concert was Frederick's first. Frasier tried to get out of going but Lilith would have none of that.

questions.text: What concert of Nanny G's did Woody see?
questions.explanation:
Itsy Bitsy World Concert.

	Woody said he fell in love when he saw that concert. This shows Woody's innocence, Nanny G is a children's singer, but Woody loves her.

Emma Thompson.

	Emma Thompson was born April 18, 1959 in London, England. She was married to Kennneth Branagh from 1989-1995. In 2003, she married Gary Wise.

Frasier's first wife.

	Frasier "forgot" to mention to Lilith he was married before her. The roles changed and now Frasier loved Nanny G and Lilith hated her.

questions.text: What happened when Nanny G hugs Lilith?
options: Lilith steps aside avoiding the hug
questions.explanation:
Lilith doesn't hug back.

	Lilith was not a huggy person. On top of that she can't stand Nanny G. so she just sat there without hugging back.

questions.text: What did Lilith say she'd smell like for the rest of the day when Nanny G hugged her for the second time?
questions.explanation:
Gingerbread.

	Norm and Cliff smelled gingerbread and tracked it down to Nanny G. Lilith was against the birthday  concert Nanny G held for Frederick.

questions.text: What song did Nanny G sing that was more for frasier than Frederick?
questions.correct: The First Time Ever I Saw Your Face
questions.explanation:
The First Time Ever I Saw Your Face.

	"The First Time Ever I Saw Your Face" was written by Ewan MacColl. It is a 1957 folk song.

questions.text: What was the number the doll Nanny G gave Frederick kept repeating?
questions.explanation:
555-6792.

	Lilith realized that Nanny G was giving her phone number. Lilith stopped the doll by ripping its head off.
